import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import { Link, redirect } from 'react-router-dom' import { Form, Row, Col, Button } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import Message from '../components/Message' import Loader from '../components/Loader' import FormContainer from '../components/FormContainer' import { login } from '../actions/userActions' const LoginScreen = () => { const [email, setEmail] = useState('') const [password, setPassword] = useState('') return
